metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20802 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of service by issuing specially crafted queries with compound indexes affecting QueryPlanner. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.9, v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.3.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
